properties.description: Capability identifier of the failed message
properties.name: failed_message_identifier

properties.description: Message type of the failed message
properties.name: failed_message_type

values.pretty_name: Unsupported Capability - Car has not the capability to perform the command
values.name: unsupported_capability

values.pretty_name: Unauthorised - User has not been authenticated or lacks permissions
values.name: unauthorised

values.pretty_name: Incorrect State - Command can not be executed in the current car state
values.name: incorrect_state

values.pretty_name: Execution Timeout - Command failed to execute in time for an unknown reason
values.name: execution_timeout

values.pretty_name: Vehicle Asleep - Car has to be waken up before the command can be used. If this is for a virtual car, the emulator has to be loaded
values.name: vehicle_asleep

properties.description: Failure description bytes formatted in UTF-8
properties.name: failure_description
